neighbors.name: Logan Buis
neighbors.claims: Logan Buis owns at least two parcels of land in Putnam County, classified under agricultural property use in Indiana’s tax system [Tippecanoe County, IN](https://www.tippecanoe.in.gov/157/Property-Class-Codes). No references to Logan Buis were found in local government minutes or news archives as of January 2026 [Putnam County Government](https://www.putnamcounty67.us/cgi.exe?CALL_PROGRAM=MINUTES&PAGEID=0010).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via informal, one-on-one outreach stressing respect for agricultural land use. Having a fellow local farmer or trusted community member introduce the development plans could help build trust.

neighbors.name: Mark E. Toebbe & Julie M. Toebbe
neighbors.claims: Julie M. Toebbe works as a Human Resources manager with a regional company (Pools of Fun) based in Plainfield, Indiana [Growjo](https://growjo.com/employee/Julie-Toebbe-25202192). Neither Mark nor Julie Toebbe is mentioned in local public meetings or media reports regarding community development, indicating no visible civic or political profile as of 2026 [Putnam County Government](https://www.putnamcounty67.us/cgi.exe?CALL_PROGRAM=MINUTES&PAGEID=0010).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Toebbes through a neighborly conversation or community open house. Emphasize how the project addresses common resident concerns like property values and traffic safety in order to earn their understanding.

overview_summary: Both profiled neighbors have no documented stance on local development initiatives, with neither openly supporting nor opposing any projects. Each appears to have low community influence, as none hold public office or prominent leadership roles in Putnam County.
